comments:
Description:
ImportPackage in parameter validate method will cause preview failure.
Build number:2.2.1.v20070823

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter p1.
2. Add importPackage(Packages.java.lang); in validate method of p1.
3. Preview.

Expected result:
Pop up parameter dialog and then display report cotent after input value.

Actual result:
org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Required parameter p1 is not set.

AxisFault

This is not a bug.
It's wrong usage.
